xwikidoc.name: SolrTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Solr Search Translations
xwikidoc.content:
solr.admin.title=Solr Search Administration solr.admin.submit=Apply solr.admin.error.notallowed=You are not allowed to perform this action. solr.admin.error.norights=Administration rights are required to access this section.
solr.admin.status.title=Status solr.admin.status.queueSize.label=Queue Size solr.admin.status.queueSize.hint=The number of entities that are left to be indexed, re-indexed or deleted from the index (depending on the executed action).
solr.admin.indexing.title=Indexing solr.admin.indexing.action.label=Action solr.admin.indexing.action.hint=The action to perform on the index. solr.admin.indexing.action.select_index=Add to index solr.admin.indexing.action.select_delete=Delete from index solr.admin.indexing.action.select_reindex=Reindex solr.admin.indexing.wiki.label=Wiki solr.admin.indexing.wiki.hint=The wiki for which all its documents will be affected by the selected action. solr.admin.indexing.wiki.select_farm=Entire farm solr.admin.indexing.query.label=Custom query solr.admin.indexing.query.hint=Optional query to limit the documents that will be affected by the selected action in the index.
solr.sortBy=Sort by: solr.sortBy.score=Relevance solr.sortBy.title_sort=Title solr.sortBy.date=Date solr.sortBy.author_display_sort=Last Author solr.sortOrder.asc=Ascending solr.sortOrder.desc=Descending
solr.result.language=Language solr.result.location=Located in {0} \u00BB {1} \u00BB {2} solr.result.author=Modified by {0} on {1} solr.result.mediaType=File of type {0} solr.result.object=Object of type {0} solr.result.property=Property {0}#{1} solr.result.highlightAll=Highlight all matches
solr.filter.title=Advanced Options solr.filter.hint=Select predefined filters that will be applied on your query. solr.filter.toggle=Toggle the search filter solr.filterBy.wiki=Wiki solr.filterBy.wiki.all=All wikis solr.filterBy.type=Type solr.filterBy.type.all=All types solr.filterBy.type.document=Document solr.filterBy.type.attachment=Attachment solr.filterBy.type.object=Object solr.filterBy.type.object_property=Object property solr.filterBy.language=Language solr.filterBy.language.all=All languages solr.filterBy.space=Space solr.filterBy.fileType=File type solr.filterBy.fileType.all=All file types solr.filterBy.fileType.image=Image solr.filterBy.fileType.audio=Audio solr.filterBy.fileType.video=Video solr.filterBy.fileType.text=Text solr.filter.queryBoost.label=Query boost solr.filter.queryBoost.hint=Allows to modify the relevance of certain fields e.g. title^1.2 name^2.0 author^1.0 doccontent^0.5
solr.facets.title=Refine your search solr.facets.hint=Select a category and activate filters on the current results solr.facets.resetAll=Reset all solr.facets.expandAll=Expand all solr.facets.collapseAll=Collapse all solr.facets.emptyValue=Empty Value
solr.field.locale=Language solr.field.locale.emptyValue=No Language solr.field.wiki=Wiki solr.field.space=Space solr.field.space_exact=Space solr.field.name=Page solr.field.name_exact=Page solr.field.title=Title solr.field.author_display=Author solr.field.creator_display=Creator solr.field.date=Last Modification Date solr.field.creationdate=Creation Date solr.field.doccontent=Rendered Document Content solr.field.doccontentraw=Raw Document Content solr.field.propertyname=Property Name solr.field.propertyvalue=Property Value solr.field.filename=Attachment Name solr.field.attcontent=Attachment Content solr.field.comment=Comments solr.field.objcontent=Objects
